SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.object

Interface Movable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseObject
public interface Movable

Movable

The Movable interface represents objects that can be moved, accelerated, and rotated in 3D space. It provides methods for getting and setting the location, acceleration, rotation, and rotation rate of the object, as well as methods for applying movements, accelerations, and rotations to the object.
